ADMIN_ROLES.description: IDs of roles that are considered bot administrators

COMMAND_CHANNELS.description: Channels where administrators can run select commands

EMBED_COLOUR.description: RGB values of the embed message highlight color

AWARD_ENABLED_CHANNELS.description: List of channels that users can receive awards randomly for messages, as well as any additional multipliers

BASE_AWARD_CHANCE.description: Base chance a user's message will trigger a point award, as a decimal (e.g. a 5% chance is 0.05, a 0.1% chance is 0.001)

AWARD_PROCESS_DELAY.description: Minimum time (in minutes) a queued award is pending before the points are credited to the user

AWARD_PROCESS_INTERVAL.description: How often (in minutes) the bot should attempt to process any pending awards

PROCESS_AWARDS.description: Whether or not the bot should process the award queue on the interval specified

REDEMPTION_CHANNEL.description: Channel ID that user reward redemptions should be posted to
